content.text: I'm doing well, thanks!  I'm a little stressed out about work, but I'm trying to stay positive.
I can relate, I find that listening to Jim Hendrix helps me relax.  What are your favorite bands?
I'm a big fan of The Beatles, and I also like some classic rock like Pink Floyd.  What kind of music do you like?
I love classic rock too!  I also like some country music, and I'm a big fan of mystery novels.  What kind of books do you like to read?
I'm a big fan of science fiction and fantasy, and I also like to read about history.  I'm trying to get into mystery novels, but I haven't found one that I really love yet.
I'm sure you'll find one you like!  Have you read any Agatha Christie or Sherlock Holmes?
I've read a few Agatha Christie novels, but I haven't read any Sherlock Holmes yet.  I'll have to check them out!
They're both great series, I'm sure you'll enjoy them!
